page.title: 11SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Moulton there are plenty of social activities such as choir,Morris Men,77 band,horse riding,Art Group and Moulton Players. The church choir is organised by Tony(the church organist) who takes any people who are willing. It is for 9 upwards every Wednesday night at 7.30pm (Adults) 7.00pm (boys or girls). Moulton Players is a big organisation which is held at the Barn Theatre weekly. Any willing person from 12 upwards can go and be in plays which are shown properly on stage and anyone can watch. The Morris Men practice at the Methodist Hall,they welcome anyone who wants to learn Morris Dancing. They have weekly practices and at the end of their hard work they have the proud deed of leading the May Cart. The Moulton 77 band bought a new uniform in the summer of 1985.
